subject: Dakar Rally
lead_paragraph: Stéphane Peterhansel and Cyril Despres of France won the Dakar Rally, completing the final stage in Lima, Peru, two weeks after the race began in Argentina.
snippet: Stéphane Peterhansel and Cyril Despres of France won the Dakar Rally, completing the final stage in Lima, Peru, two weeks after the race began in Argentina.
